isExcluded

public static boolean isExcluded(org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
Elaborate method to check whether a player is excluded from ranking. When a player has a wildcard permission but is an OP, it will return false; When a player has a wildcard permission but is not an OP, it will return true; When a player only has autorank.exclude, it will return true;

Parameters:
player - Player to check for
Returns:
whether a player is excluded from ranking or not.

getCorrectName

public static java.lang.String getCorrectName(java.lang.String oldName)
This will return the correct type of the requirement. As players might want to use multiple requirements of the same type, they only have to specify the name of it with a unique identifier.

Parameters:
oldName - Name of the requirement to search for.
Returns:
correct requirement name or old name if none was found.

registerRequirement
